Welcome to my blog @ github.

My intention is to blog about the problems i encounter and the solutions i discover while using computers.

I create software systems for a living and sometimes for the fun of it.

  • posting svn commit notifications to slack
  • Packaging a spring-boot application for distribution with docker

  • running ntopng on ubuntu 14.04
